snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, 17, had a combined time of 1 minute 51.45 seconds in taking a women’s World Cup race in Flachau, Austria.
abstract: American teenager Mikaela Shiffrin wins women’s World Cup slalom in Australia.
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, 17, had a combined time of 1 minute 51.45 seconds in taking a women’s World Cup race in Flachau, Austria.

headline.seo: Mikaela Shiffrin Wins Again in Slalom
headline.main: American Teenager Continues Her Success in Slalom
headline.print_headline: American Teenager Continues Her Success in Slalom
